channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Enfold
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Enfold

item.title: CVE-2021-24719|2024-08-03T19:42:16.657Z -- unknown -- enfold
item.description: The Enfold Enfold WordPress theme before 4.8.4 was vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). The vulnerability is present on Enfold versions previous than 4.8.4 which use Avia Page Builder.
